channel.title: No Such Thing As A Fish
channel.description:
Award-winning podcast from the QI offices in which the writers of the hit BBC show discuss the best things they've found out this week.
Hosted by Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland) with James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm), and Anna Ptaszynski (#GetAnnaOnTwitter)

image.title: No Such Thing As A Fish

item.title: 348: No Such Thing As Infinite Toilet Paper

item.description:
Dan, Anna, Andrew and James discuss burglary tools, hornet tales, and infinite tiles.

item.title: 346: No Such Thing As An Unsexy Astronaut
item.itunes:title: No Such Thing As An Unsexy Astronaut
item.description:
Dan, Anna, Andrew and Major Tim Peake discuss an out of this world diet, the last species on Earth, and what Tom Collins has been saying behind all of your backs.
Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
